channel.title: Pages on Erin Austin
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Erin Austin

item.title: About
item.description: Erin Austin Following graduating with a BSc in Physics from the University of St Andrews in 2016 and a few years working with geospatial data and navigation apps as a product owner, I am now moving into the world of software development as a Graduate Test Engineer for Scott Logic in Newcastle. This is my personal blog where I post sporadically about solutions to problems I’ve found particularly challenging. Feel free to visit my github or contact me via email.

item.title: Site notice
item.description: This site contains my own personal thoughts and opinions, for entertainment purposes only.
